metadata.title: CVE-2024-22373 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in theJPEG2000Codec::DecodeByStreamsCommon functionality of Mathieu MalaterreGrassroot DICOM 3.0.23. A specially crafted DICOM file can lead to a heapbuffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gdcm package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
